'''1.16 Pre-release 5''' (known as '''1.16-pre5''' in the [[launcher]]) is the fifth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.16]], released on June 12, 2020,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-16-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.16 Pre-Release 5|June 12, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
[[File:Fabulous setting warning for Mesa on Linux.png|thumb|A warning message for ''Fabulous!'' graphics.]]

'''[[Options]]'''
* Added a warning message for enabling ''Fabulous!'' graphics.
** The message appears when the player's graphics driver is known to have rendering issues with the graphics option, or if the driver is detected as problematic.
** The list of drivers affected can be changed using [[resource pack]]s.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Water]]'''
* The texture used by water when adjacent to glass and similar such blocks was darkened.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Removed the quotes around "Fast" and "Fancy" in the descriptions for these graphics types.
* Instances of "Fabulous!" in the description for fabulous graphics now appears in italics ("''Fabulous!''").

'''World creation'''
* Changed the description of the <code>doMobLoot</code> and <code>doTileDrops</code> [[game rule]]s from "Controls resource drops, including experience orbs" to "Controls resource drops from <mobs/blocks>, including experience orbs"<ref>{{Bug|MC-188652}}</ref>
